resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82373</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82373</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5032</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Paired Reading</string>
            <string language="es">Lectura compartida</string>
            <string language="ga">Léitheoireacht Beirte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammengepaßter Messwert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture Appareillée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leitura Emparelhada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettura Accoppiata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξινομημένη κατά ζεύγος ανάγνωση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Paired Reading is a strategy to bring more enjoyment and confidence into the reading time of the student.  It is supportive and rewarding and gives the student as much choice regarding materials as is possible.</string>
            <string language="es">La lectura compartida es una estrategia para que el estudiante disfrute más y gane más confianza en su tiempo dedicado a la lectura. Es alentadora y gratificante y da al estudiante la máxima elección sobre materiales posible.</string>
            <string language="ga">Is straitéis é léitheoireacht beirtechun níos mó taitnimh agus muiníne a chur in am léitheoireachta an dalta. Tá sé tacúil agus tá luach le baint as agus tugann sé an méid rogha agus is féidir i leith ábhair leitheoireachta agus is féidir.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammengepaßter Messwert ist eine Strategie, 
zum mehr Genusses und Vertrauens in die Lesezeit des Kursteilnehmers 
zu holen. Er ist unterstützend und belohnend und gibt dem 
Kursteilnehmer so viel Wahl betreffend ist Materialien, wie möglich 
ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La lecture appareillée est une stratégie pour 
introduire plus de plaisir et de confiance dans la période de lecture
de l'étudiant. Elle est de support et récompensante et donne 
à l'étudiant autant choix concernant des matériaux qu'est possible.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A leitura emparelhada é uma estratégia para 
trazer mais apreciação e confiança na época da leitura do 
estudante. É de suporte e recompensando e dá ao estudante 
tanta escolha a respeito dos materiais quanto é possível.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lettura accoppiata è una strategia per 
introdurre più godimento e riservatezza nel periodo della lettura 
dell'allievo. È di appoggio e ricompensante e dà all'allievo 
tanta scelta per quanto riguarda i materiali quanto è possibile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ταξινομημένη κατά ζεύγος ανάγνωση είναι μια 
στρατηγική για να φέρει την περισσότερες απόλαυση και εμπιστοσύνη
στο χρόνο ανάγνωσης του σπουδαστή. Είναι ενθαρρυντικό και 
ανταμείβοντας και δίνει στο σπουδαστή τόσο πολλή επιλογή 
σχετικά με τα υλικά όπως είναι δυνατός.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
